replies.body: Which icon would Oceania receive? Or are we not included in the regions available?

Do you mean based on who wins? We did not qualify for MSI (lost at Wildcards) so you can't get the gilded regional Summoner Icon for 1 IP. You can however get the gilded regional Summoner Icon for 250 RP.

To use an example, if Korea wins MSI then players on the Korean server will get the gilded regional  Summoner Icon for 1 IP. Every other region can purchase it for 250 RP.

You can also get the MSI 2016 Summoner Icon in the store right now for 1 IP. The other region ones cost 250 RP.
That's no surprise that we lost...
Bummer! I haven't been following the pro scene too closely so I wasn't sure if we had a team playing this time. Good to know though, thanks. :)
I don't see why we wouldn't be :/ We have esport teams in League.
we have no team in the MSI

I strongly think that Riot need to sit down with the Community Manager in charge of the MSI Community Event, because he just segregated off 5 developing regions. How is that meant to help develop growth in the regions? 

Bad Move Riot, bad move.
Just looked at the store and the price for the SSW Team Bundle is wrong. It says that its 2939 RP even with all champs accounted for. So is it 2939 RP or 2100 RP?
The bundle is 2939 RP if you already own the champions. If you do not own the champions it is 5881 RP.
So just clarify again when the individual skins will go off sale please.
